subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.
author: Fransen, Debbie
full_text:
------_=_NextPart_001_01C9E2AA.608D04C1
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="us-ascii"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

There are alot of people who would like Frank to make a box for them (
incl=
uding me).
I think we would all furnish whatever he needed or just purchase=
 a box
from him.
Frank doesn't want to sell anything that is not perfected,=
 but none of
this is a guarantee
that you will get some kind of spirit comm=
unication.
I wonder if Chris Moon has thought about how his profits are goi=
ng to
decline if Frank
makes boxes to sell ?
 

___________________________=
_____

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Be=
half
Of SnowfireL@...
Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 11:21 AM
To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.





Well, I w=
ouldn't mind having a Frank's box, I would be more then glad to
buy one fro=
m him should he wish ever to make one for me,  I would like
it's wood paint=
ed in an azure blue trim please with the rest a natural
shade of Mahogany (=
if can be found) or aromatic cedar (and I would be
glad to supply the wood =
as, I have hundreds of tress here. <s>sf
 
In a message dated 5/29/2009 10:=
01:49 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
april@... writes=
:

	



	
	I think the bottom line is we all know that Chris Moon is
probab=
ly just trying to use you. He'll suck you dry and toss you aside
when he ge=
ts his fill.
	 

		----- Original Message ----- 
		From: Fransen, Debbie <m=
ailto:debbie.fransen@...>

		To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
<mailto:EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com>  
		Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 7:45 AM
		Subject: RE: =
[EVP-ITC] Different chip config.


		
		Exactly my point... You don't charg=
e anything for the
boxes
		and Chris Moon charges people for using it....
	=
	If it's not perfected then Chris shouldn't charge
either......
		If he was=
n't so public with it, then people like me
wouldn't dislike him so much.
		=
 
		The only people that have your boxes (that the public
hear about)
		are=
 the well known paranormal groups and famous people.
		I am sure that you h=
ave given boxes to researchers who
are not in the popular
		paranormal comm=
unity ,and don't want to be. Those are
the ones that should
		get respect. =
 And of course YOU are well respected by us
lowly researchers. ( Kissin up =
, so you won't get mad)
		 
		And I am sure that you are sick of hearing ab=
out Chris
Moon and how
		alot of people thinks he sucks. And everyone wants=
 a
box......
		But you have to expect that. You are the only one out
there =
that is honest and
		doesn't want to be famous.
		I know this is like beati=
ng a dead horse, so I will shut
up now.... :)
		 
		 
		
		
_______________=
_________________

		From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com] On Behalf Of Frank Sumption
		Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 9:22 AM
	=
	To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
		Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config=
.
		
		

		
		 Keep in mind the money thing works two ways, I also
don't se=
ll/charge for the boxes. Someday I will--when it's perfected!
		 
		 Frank-=
S
		
		
		On Fri, May 29, 2009 at 6:16 AM, Fransen, Debbie
<debbie.fransen@=
delta.com <mailto:debbie.fransen@...> > wrote:
		



			
			Of course=
 Chris Moon speaks highly of him.
			Frank has made him lots of money.

___=
_____________________________

			From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
<mailto:EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com>  [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
<mailto:EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups.com> ] On Behalf Of Elaine Coates
			Sent: Thursday, May 28, 2009 3=
:49 PM 

			To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
	=
		
			Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.
			


			
			Okay, then=
 could I have a copy of the new
schematic when you get it drawn?  That woul=
d be even better.  Where are
you from?  Chris Moon speaks highly of you.
		=
	

			
________________________________

			From: Frank Sumption <purpleali=
engirl@...
<mailto:purplealiengirl@...> >
			To: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com
<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
			Sent: Thursday, May 28, 2009=
 2:29:09 PM
			Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.
			
			

			Be=
sides--I didn't like that radio design, it's
too complex, and the documenta=
tion is screwy. I did a simpler radio last
night that should be better, sim=
pler, cheaper, and clearer sound. 
			
			
			On Thu, May 28, 2009 at 5:41 =
AM, Elaine Coates
<cozykat2003@ yahoo.com <mailto:cozykat2003@...> > =
wrote:
			



				
				The jpg for this schematic is kind of
blurry in plac=
es.  Is there any way a more clear copy could be send to
me? I would be for=
ever grateful.  Thanks Frank - Elaine
				

				
__________________________=
______

				From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@
gmail.com <mailto:purple=
aliengirl@...> >
				
				To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
<mailto:EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.com> 
				Sent: Thursday, May 28, 2009 12:55:00 AM
				Subjec=
t: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip
config.
				
				

				
				http://purpleal=
ieng irl.tripod. com/
<http://purplealiengirl.tripod.com/>  
				 
				 How=
ever, it's constantly changing. The
radio I made tonight is very simple, an=
d can significantly simplify
construction. I used to make the sweep and amp=
lifier circuits, then use
a commercial radio, like the 12-469, as a tuner. =

				 
				 The MK484 is follwed by a couple high
impedence op amp stages t=
o bring the audio up to line levels. I haven't
had time to do schematic yet=
. I draw the schematics with MS paint, and
they are stored as jpeg images, =
which isn't the best, but it makes them
e-mailable. 
				 
				 Frank-S
			=
	
				
				On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 8:54 PM, Elaine
Coates <cozykat2003@ yah=
oo.com <mailto:cozykat2003@...> > wrote:
				



				
				Hi folks, I=
 just joined this group.  I
was recently at the Lizzy Borden house in Massa=
chusetts with Chris Moon
and had a session with Frank's Box.  The results w=
ere astounding.  Is
this the newest schematic for Frank's box?  If so, is t=
here a way to get
a clearer copy of it?  My son said he would build one for=
 me and I have
been searching for the schematic.  Can anyone help? - Elaine=

				

				
________________________________

				From: Frank Sumption <pur=
plealiengirl@
gmail.com <mailto:purplealiengirl@...> >
				
				To: e=
vp-itc@yahoogroups .com
<mailto:evp-itc@yahoogroups.com> ; grassharp@yahoog=
rou ps.com
<mailto:grassharp@yahoogroups.com>  

				Sent: Wednesday, May 2=
7, 2009 5:45:16 PM
				Subject: [EVP-ITC] Different chip
config. [1 Attachm=
ent]
				


				
				 I think I followed an erroneous LM3820
layout, so I'm=
 going to breadboard this layout. Note the antenna input
is now on pin 12-1=
1, this is the RF amp input, and pin 13 is the RF amp
output, which feeds p=
in 1.
				 
				 'case anyone cares. 
				 
				 F-S

				

				

				

			=
	

				

				

				

				


				

				

				

				

				

				


			

			

=
